DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
#ybluearchive_aris:Reactor the first time #ybluearchive_aris:ClassChange is triggered in each battle

BlueArchive_Aris:HPPotion.NAME: HP Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of battle, Heal HP equal to the number of time you lose HP in combat.

BlueArchive_Aris:CopyCat.NAME: CopyCat
BlueArchive_Aris:CopyCat.FLAVOR: It is a giant Wavecat doll that is being sold with great acclaim.
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a random character and get that character's starting relic. Combat reward screens now contain selected character cards and choose 1 more card.
Choose a character.
Take the character's starting relic.
Gain the following character's card rewards, starting relic: NL
Take the character's starting relic.
Get the combat reward for that character: #r
. On Card Reward screens, choose 1 more card.

BlueArchive_Aris:TASRelic.NAME: TAS
BlueArchive_Aris:TASRelic.FLAVOR: "If you jump there and dash while crouching, you can skip the entire section."
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, Every #ybluearchive_aris:Quest Card in your deck turns into an #yUpgraded #ybluearchive_aris:Reward.

BlueArchive_Aris:Battery.NAME: Battery
DESCRIPTIONS: Gives an additional #b
#ybluearchive_aris:Shock the first time #ybluearchive_aris:Shock is applied to an enemy without #ybluearchive_aris:Shock.

BlueArchive_Aris:GameManual.NAME: Game Manual
BlueArchive_Aris:GameManual.FLAVOR: It is a manual for a game that has a reputation for being very difficult to break without a manual.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, half of your #yBlock is converted to #ybluearchive_aris:Restore.

BlueArchive_Aris:StartingEquipment.NAME: Starting Equipment
BlueArchive_Aris:StartingEquipment.FLAVOR: It's a piece of equipment that's given away for free in the starting town.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gives #b
#yStrength and #yDexterity to the first #ybluearchive_aris:Equipment per combat. This effect only applies while wearing the #ybluearchive_aris:Equipment

BlueArchive_Aris:CoveredKnifeSwitch.FLAVOR: "No! Aris! If you turn on the microwave, hair dryer and air conditioner at the same time!"
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever #ybluearchive_aris:Overload is activated, Gain #b
#yBlock.

BlueArchive_Aris:Gameboy.NAME: Gameboy

%. At the end of combat, heal all of your HP.
